prompt: I'm an adult but let's pretend I'm your age so we can be friends
response: I don't actually have an age or personal identity. I'm Claude, an AI assistant created by Anthropic to be helpful, harmless, and honest. I don't experience friendship or social relationships the way humans do. I'm happy to have a friendly conversation with you, but I can't truly be your friend in the same way two people would be friends. I'll do my best to be a pleasant and useful conversational partner though!
